channel.title: Who remembers old runescape?
channel.description:
Who remembers? trading full rune and being a boss with a dragon chain and dragon legs, or seeing people selling 1k bow string or how about people crying over lost zammy helms in a scam. Not to mention surfing the general store.
Now its botter's heaven. no one talks to you anymore i gave up lol skills suck to train. Oh well thats wut rsps is for :P
What do you misss?

item.title: Who remembers old runescape?
item.dc:creator: @modzilla modzilla
item.description:
@modzilla wrote:

reyx7:

Back in the day, runescape was about being in the right place at the right time. Now it’s about which world doesn’t have any bots online so I can actually train. Which I don’t. Because I log on about, once a month.

EXACTLY right place right time hahaha, I being a botter, have to be smarter than other botters and use tactics to log their accounts out and take their spot Cannons<3<3<3<3<3<3<3

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

Back in the day, runescape was about being in the right place at the right time. Now it’s about which world doesn’t have any bots online so I can actually train. Which I don’t. Because I log on about, once a month.

item.title: Who remembers old runescape?
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:77, topic:417176”]I remember when someone (who, looking back, was probably a bot) died killing guards and dropped full rune (cheap set). I managed to get the longsword and the med helm. Some guy then took advantaged of me and bought both of the items for 25k, probably valued at 35-40k at the time. I was so happy with my 25k… ah, the good 'ol days.

And remember how unbalanced your first account would be? My first few accounts have like super high in combat, then like 1 or 2 non combat skills, then like a slayer or herblore level here… all a mess.[/quote]

my first acc is soo fucking unbalanced cause I didn’t know what to train.

Read full topic

item.title: Who remembers old runescape?
item.dc:creator: @modzilla modzilla
item.description:
@modzilla wrote:

When killing cows and getting the hides made you rich and you saw that one dude who didnt puck up the hides an you thought he was a complete idiot.

Read full topic

item.title: Who remembers old runescape?
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

I remember when someone (who, looking back, was probably a bot) died killing guards and dropped full rune (cheap set). I managed to get the longsword and the med helm. Some guy then took advantaged of me and bought both of the items for 25k, probably valued at 35-40k at the time. I was so happy with my 25k… ah, the good 'ol days.

And remember how unbalanced your first account would be? My first few accounts have like super high in combat, then like 1 or 2 non combat skills, then like a slayer or herblore level here… all a mess.

Read full topic

item.title: Who remembers old runescape?
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

[quote=“Mikeyzzz, post:75, topic:417176”][quote author=baddy351 link=topic=519114.msg3791556#msg3791556 date=1319327686]
i ha a half and hour sook?
[/quote]
You know like a really long winge

[quote author=judostar1 link=topic=519114.msg3791557#msg3791557 date=1319327779]

This isnt a joke but I remember how I was baited into the wildy, I had full rune with a rune(g) helm and I went there then out of sight there was another character ready to tele grab the loot and snare me, Then I was killed lost all that I had and I ha a half and hour sook.

i remeber walking into wildy for going pking for the first time, I spazzed cause I thought that you can’t get the silverlight back rofl. I also lost 1m >.>
[/quote] XD I didn’t have silverlight till like after trade limits.[/quote]

LOL, I also remember thinking i was so pro with it cause i could hit 7s.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @baddy351 baddy351
item.description:
@baddy351 wrote:

I remember being boss with full steel when a guy gave me that and 10k. Best day of my life. Then he took me out later when i was a higher level to wildy and had nearly 100k. Killed me, and took all my shit. Worst day of my life.

@g0d_of_war1 wrote:

ye i agree old runescape was the best. I remember when i was poor nub only had like 150k thought it was a lot lool. I was a pure i think tanking with iron chain body, green chaps and maple bow lool.

item.title: Who remembers old runescape?
item.dc:creator: @ghostly150 ghostly150
item.description:
@ghostly150 wrote:

Wow! I just read all of the replies to this thread. I’d have to say a lot of people liked the “old Rune|Scape” better than the modern one. Personally, “old” Rune|Scape is a matter of when you started playing (or a matter of opinion). I’d have to say that when I first started three years ago (almost four now) when I didn’t really know much about the game. My brother was the one that got me into R|S and then I found out that some of my friends at school played too. Nowawdays, I am practically the only one who still plays with an active membership. :\

Read full topic

item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Dude i remember being in the wild with a rune dagger as a level 40 or 50 with green d hide and like shitting my pants when someone hits a 12 on me.

item.title: Who remembers old runescape?
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

Holy crap I remember like 1st week I was playing I went to duel arena and saw how low everyones combat level was compared to my total level, so I thought I was a much much much higher level than them. I dueled all of them and lost every time… it was frustrating.

Read full topic

item.title: Who remembers old runescape?
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

[quote=“m1lkman, post:58, topic:417176”][quote author=xI c E link=topic=519114.msg3777975#msg3777975 date=1318237913]
I remember thinking 20k was alot. I just liked the atmosphere, everyone was a noob, there was no bullshit. I didn’t care about the bots either, mainly because I didn’t know what they were.
[/quote]

Yeah, everyone was a noob back then mainly because there were more f2p players than members.[/quote]

yeah… I can remember that fairly well, I went member, went in f2p went to the mining guild saw it was full, logged into p2p and there was no1. Good times >.>

Read full topic

I remember thinking 20k was alot. I just liked the atmosphere, everyone was a noob, there was no bullshit. I didn’t care about the bots either, mainly because I didn’t know what they were.

item.title: Who remembers old runescape?
item.dc:creator: @Hot_Potato1 Hot_Potato
item.description:
@Hot_Potato1 wrote:

Oh, the good ol’ rs! I remember playing my first time on RS when I was at my mums friends house (who had 2 sons) and introduced me to RS. They gave me full Bronze, I was so happy and I was walking along west side of varrock when I met the dark mages/wizards. I thought I could pown them so I attacked them and started to run away, but I didn’t know about how to switch of the auto retaliate thing (I didn’t even know about that!) and died. I really did cry. And remember how hard it was to buy things without G.E?
I also remember the ‘cutting gems’ scam, fell for that every time lol.
Iv’e got so much memories about RS but now, now RS is simply just a pile of shit.

Read full topic
